mapper.select: select * from seat order by seat_col asc
mapper.insert: insert into seat( seat_no, seat_col, seat_row, seat_level ) values( #{seatNo}, #{seatCol}, #{seatRow}, #{seatLevel} )
mapper.update: update seat set seat_col=#{seatCol}, seat_row=#{seatRow}, seat_level=#{seatLevel} where seat_no=#{seatNo}
